pullrequest.title: [gazebo11] Add helper function PhysicsEngine::any_cast to handle std::any

content.raw:
I fixed a marker test failure in e489d95 in the target branch (pull request #3139) and merged it into this branch

I also fixed a PresetManager test failure by making the any_cast helper function public, using it in the PresetManager test, and recommending that the helper function is used for any `Get*` API's that return `boost::any` from `PresetManager.hh`. These API's are not frequently used outside of osrf/gazebo, so I think this is a relatively low impact
content.html:
I fixed a marker test failure in e489d95 in the target branch (pull request #3139) and merged it into this branch

I also fixed a PresetManager test failure by making the any_cast helper function public, using it in the PresetManager test, and recommending that the helper function is used for any Get* API's that return boost::any from PresetManager.hh. These API's are not frequently used outside of osrf/gazebo, so I think this is a relatively low impact
